metadata.synopsis: A tired British pop singer (Suzanna Leigh) tries to rest on an island where two different men (Frank Finlay, Guy Doleman) keep bees.

reviews: It's always doomed to be a very little, very silly film, but mostly the cast seems to know this and play it accordingly.
The special effects surrounding the bee attacks are poor, and the climactic twist shouldn't fool anyone over the age of 12.
